# CPSupportsInstrumentClusterNavigationScene

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value that indicates whether your app supports displaying navigation content in the CarPlay Instrument Cluster.

## Discussion

To declare support for displaying navigation content in the CarPlay Instruments Cluster, add this key and set its value to YES. You specify the scene configurations using the [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UIApplicationSceneManifest/UISceneConfigurations/CPTemplateApplicationInstrumentClusterSceneSessionRoleApplication] key.

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CarPlay/displaying-content-in-carplay].

## CarPlay

- **CPSupportsDashboardNavigationScene**: A Boolean value that indicates whether your app supports displaying navigation content in the CarPlay Dashboard.
